separator.string: Options for support material and raft
Short layer time - began to increase base fan speed
Very short layer time - began to decrease extrusion rate

group.p: Fan will be turned off by default.

If estimated layer time is below ~60s, but still greater than ~5s, fan will run at a proportionally increasing speed between 35% and 100%, at 100% over bridges if it's above the current computed fan speed ; except for the first 3 layers where the fan is disabled.

If estimated layer time is below ~5s fan will run by default to100% (except for the first 3 layers where the fan is disabled) and print speed will be reduced so that no less than 5s are spent on that layer (however, speed will never be reduced below 10mm/s or up to 90% reduction).

separator.string: Toolchange parameters with single extruder MM printers

group.p: All the next fields are in this format : (normal, stealth)

separator.string: Retraction when tool is disabled (advanced settings for multi-extruder setups)
